mapper.select: select officeName, floor, acreages, rent, max, photo, occupancy from office order by floor

select branchName, floor, officeName, acreages, rent, occupancy, comName, max from office a left outer join companyInfo b on a.officeNum=b.officeNum left outer join branch c on a.branchCode=c.branchCode order by officeName

select branchName, floor, officeName, acreages, rent, occupancy, max, comName from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode left outer join companyInfo c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum where a.officeName=#{officeName}
mapper.insert: insert into office (branchCode, floor, acreages, rent, officeName, max) values (#{branchCode}, #{floor}, #{acreages}, #{rent}, #{officeName}, #{max})
mapper.select: select officeNum from office where officeName=#{officeName}
